Replace.Text: Merciful Yishen Ziyuan, endless misfortunes enveloped you, corroded everything around you, and created disasters like natural disasters, but you still did not give up any hope, and vowed to lead your people to get rid of the eternal curse. This time you will either protect all living beings and take on everything, or become a natural disaster and sweep the earth, but the people will always follow you and keep moving forward!
[COLOR_SuzerainDark] Touhou Project Leader Package [ENDCOLOR]———[COLOR_FLOAT_DIPLOMATIC] Yishen Ziyuan [ENDCOLOR]
Gumingdi Danxiao
basking shark
The civilization led by Yishen Ziyuan - the domain of misfortune

Civilization led by Ishin Shion—Unfortunate God’s Domain[NEWLINE] This is my fifth mod, and it’s finally finished, but I don’t really like this mod because I don’t think it’s as interesting as the previous ones Features, like all piled up values, don't feel like there are things to do all the time. [NEWLINE]Music added this time too, but not as much.
Sanctuary of Misfortune
Sanctuary of Misfortune
Sanctuary of Misfortune
Touhou Hua
Ishin Aster
Fortunately, it looks like you are unlikely to be unlucky anymore.
god of poverty
Cities +70% [ICON_FAITH] faith, -70% [ICON_GOLD] gold production.
The most vicious twin sister

Buildings and units can be purchased through [ICON_FAITH] faith (including civilians, melee, long-range, flying), and the cost of [ICON_FAITH] faith and [ICON_GOLD] gold coins for all buildings and units is increased by 100%, and when building a commercial center -200% [ICON_PRODUCTION ] Productivity, yielding 2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith per unit. [NEWLINE] (Distinctive policy card will appear after unlocking Theology Civics)
believer
+2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith per turn
God of Poverty

Featured area in Dominion of Misfortune, in place of Holy Site, unlocked by Astrology. [NEWLINE]The cost is lower, and when there is no area around, it will get +5 [ICON_FAITH] Adjacent Bonus of Faith Area, and -10 [ICON_FAITH] Adjacency Bonus of Faith Area for each surrounding area. Has a new adjacency bonus, +50% adjacency bonus when adjacent to man-made wonders.

A holy place that collects and spreads misfortunes sounds so ironic. Being a god can only bring misfortune to the surroundings. What is even more ironic is that there are still people who believe in and follow such a god. [NEWLINE]Such a location is not suitable for connecting with other important places, it will only bring the accumulated misfortune to others, and make the belief disappear, but the disaster and belief gathered in the location it occupies has to make people feel awe .
+{1_num}[ICON_FAITH] Faith from each adjacent natural wonder
+{1_num}[ICON_FAITH] Faith, from each adjacent forest
+{1_num}[ICON_FAITH] Faith, from each adjacent wonder
+{1_num} [ICON_FAITH] Faith, from no surrounding area
+{1_num} [ICON_FAITH] Faith, from each adjacent district
poor god bowl

The characteristic building of the God of Misfortune, located in the Holy Land, requires a shrine and a theological civic unlock. [NEWLINE]All Holy Site adjacency bonuses are increased by 10% for each Poor God Bowl, and grant [ICON_CULTURE] culture equal to Holy Site adjacency bonuses. Featured items can be performed after construction to remove debuffs from civilization abilities.

Although the imitation of the bowl in the hands of Yishen Ziyuan in the Holy Land is a poor imitation, it is connected with Ziyuan's divine power in a magical way, and it is mutually amplified among the holy places, and the ability to gather faith is shocking .
Okazaki Yumemi's Theological Performance
For each holy land, the adjacent bonus of the holy land is +10%, and the holy land produces [ICON_SCIENCE] science and technology value equal to its adjacent output.

Okazaki Yumemi has always believed that everything can be explained by science. After she reached an agreement with Shion, she began to do crazy research on matters such as belief. Perhaps in the eyes of ordinary people, it is just a bunch of messy data, according to the report. But for the people of the unfortunate God's Domain, this is the hope for the future, it is music, the best music in the world that heals their bodies and saves their souls. [NEWLINE] Variables that change the flow of the world.
Divine Extraction (1/7)

Yishen Ziyuan Exclusive Project [NEWLINE] "I can help you change the status quo, do you want to try to believe me?" [NEWLINE]All cities of your own +10% [ICON_FAITH] Faith, use [ICON_FAITH] Faith to purchase units, construction costs will be reduced by 20 %, and the debuff of civilization ability gold coins is reduced by 10%. [NEWLINE] (Next stage unlocked by Technology: Math)
Divine Extraction (2/7)

Yishen Ziyuan exclusive project [NEWLINE] "It seems that my research direction is correct." [NEWLINE] All cities of your own +10% [ICON_FAITH] faith, use [ICON_FAITH] faith to buy units, construction costs are reduced by 20%, civilization ability Gold debuff reduced by 10%. [NEWLINE] (Next stage unlocked by Technology: Education)
Divine Extraction (3/7)

Yishen Ziyuan's exclusive project[NEWLINE] "Sure enough, fantasy and science have something in common, and magic power exists."[NEWLINE]All cities of your own have +10% [ICON_FAITH] faith, use [ICON_FAITH] faith to purchase units, and the construction cost will be reduced by 20 %, and the debuff of civilization ability gold coins is reduced by 10%. [NEWLINE] (Next stage unlocked by Technology: Scientific Theory)
Divine Extraction (4/7)

Yishen Ziyuan Exclusive Project[NEWLINE] "Faith, I need more faith, and it is more than halfway to completion." [NEWLINE]All cities of your own +10% [ICON_FAITH] faith, use [ICON_FAITH] faith to buy units, and the construction cost will be reduced 20%, and the debuff of civilization ability gold coins is reduced by 10%. [NEWLINE] (Next stage unlocked by Technology: Chemistry)
Divine Extraction (5/7)

Yishen Ziyuan exclusive project[NEWLINE]“It seems that recent research shows that this will lead to a kind of disaster, huh, it’s nothing worth mentioning.”[NEWLINE]All your cities +10% [ICON_FAITH] Faith, use [ICON_FAITH ] Faith purchases units, construction costs are reduced by 20%, and civilization ability gold coin debuffs are reduced by 10%. [NEWLINE] (Next stage unlocked by Technology: Nuclear Fission)
Divine Extraction (6/7)

Yishen Ziyuan's exclusive project[NEWLINE]"It's about to be completed, but it also means that the disaster is getting closer and closer. How can I solve this."[NEWLINE]All my cities +10% [ICON_FAITH] Faith, use [ ICON_FAITH] Faith buys units, building costs are reduced by 20%, and civilization ability gold debuffs are reduced by 10%. [NEWLINE] (Next stage unlocked by Technology: Fusion)
Divine Extraction (7/7)

Ishin Ziyuan Exclusive Project[NEWLINE] "Professor Okazaki? Misfortune should be mutual, and it cannot be eliminated. Where did the previous misfortune go?" [NEWLINE]All cities of my own +10% [ICON_FAITH] Faith , Use [ICON_FAITH] faith to buy units, building costs will be reduced by 20%, and civilization ability gold coin debuffs will be reduced by 10%. [NEWLINE] (Next stage unlocked by Technology: Advanced Power Cell)
Misfortune and Natural Disasters - Yishen Ziyuan

Yishen Ziyuan exclusive project [NEWLINE] "..." "Professor?" "The outbreak has given to everyone who is not beneficial to our world development." [NEWLINE] All other civilized cities - 100% [ICON_GOLD] gold coin output, +60% [ICON_FAITH] Faith output for all civilizations.
The worst and worst
god of poverty
boarding certificate
Meishinji Temple
Hakurei Shrine
Relying on Heaven
Aura of all things
completely dependent on mutation
Disaster
the misfortune of all mankind
absolute negative
Over-plucking
Rough clothing and food
Tonight is an elegant egoist
Scourge of Liberation

This is a country centered on Ishin Shion, this is a country full of misfortunes, this is a sad country. [NEWLINE]But wherever there is thought and life, there must be hope. [NEWLINE] So this is also a bright country, and a country that will eventually wake up.

All people live in poverty and believe in the gods of their own country, even though the gods have no ability to bring them prosperity. The power of the gods is constantly increasing, but people's wealth is getting less and less. Even so, no one chooses to escape. They believe that one day the gods of their country can save themselves, and they firmly believe in it.
At present, only a small variable is needed to crush the disaster here. [NEWLINE]She's coming soon.
If you are possessed by her, your luck will decline and you will become poor, so she is a god of poverty hated by everyone. [NEWLINE]Gloomy and low-key, likes to sit back and enjoy.
Because no matter where she went, she couldn't get herself out of poverty, so she herself gave up her efforts and was listless all day long.
Because no matter where she went, she couldn't get herself out of poverty, so she herself gave up her efforts and was listless all day long.

Where did the lost property and luck go? In fact, property will turn into arrears, and luck will turn into misfortune, slowly filling her body continuously. When it is filled to a certain extent, it will burst out periodically, turning her into a super poor god, sweeping away all misfortunes.
However, it is actually a patron saint who protects others from financial misfortunes by making them poor. But even so, she is still despised by others...
(Quoted from THBWiki)
friend. . . . Yeah? We are friends.
We haven't fully accepted you here yet, please give me a little more time.
Can we be friends, can we?
We are here, um, open to you, please feel free.
Everyone is still not very willing, I will try to communicate as much as possible.
Fighting is the final decision we made together. This time, let you see what disaster is.
Is that so? . . Then I have to do my best to prove ourselves, let's experience the torrent of disaster.
Delegation, a term I have never heard of, but I believe it means friendly, let's play together.
People on our side are not ready yet. . .
It's a gift, eh! Gift! Please take it!
I wanted to try to accept you, but the facts don't make me sure of my thoughts, you are annoying. . .
so bad. . . You really. . . Too bad, badass. (condemns you)
I am Yishen Shion, and I am responsible for bringing disasters to the world, don't believe it. . . it is true.
Can you come and play with us? . . come on.
Hmm, I see.
I want to know more beautiful places in this world, and I want to visit beautiful places, is that okay?
You, hello, what. . . What's wrong.
You can read this treaty, it's fine, I have plenty of time to wait for you to read.
Well, truce.
Not yet, not over yet, I can't, not yet!
Calamity, let's do it first, maybe we should end the mutation.
If you want to go through it, go through it.
You have talked to me about the stakes for a long time, and after listening to it, I think it won't work this time.
We're just passing by, we'll be leaving soon, okay?
Many people, I feel a different atmosphere, different from the usual peaceful atmosphere, I don't suggest you go any further.
We have our own ideas, please come back.
sorry. . . . we will go.
In the end, do you still have to leave here? . . . okay, bye.
No, I'm just staying for a while, and I won't do too many disadvantageous things.
Such a deal is great, I accept it.
trust without malice
Initial favorability increased, otherwise has no effect.
Aster trusts you
I trust you, you won't do too much to us, right?
